DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of the clinical results after total knee prosthesis, and correlation with the alignment of the lower limb. Radiological measurements by means of 3D technology will be performed. The clinical result will be stipulated by means of standardized questionnaires (KOOS, KSS and Oxford knee score-questionnaire).
DOC.brief_title: Correlation Between Alignment of Lower Limb and Clinical Outcome After Total Knee Prosthesis.
DOC.criteria: Patient with osteoarthritis of the knee joint, without severe bone deformation
